title: WTT my T206 Schreck for your T05/T206 Sovereign
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTT my T206 Schreck for your T05/T206 Sovereign
posts.post_content:
Anybody need an Ossee Schreck?  His actual name was Schreckengost, but I guess he didn't like that...or maybe it just didn't fit on the card.  According to The Ballplayers, he roomed with Waddell and had it written into Rube's contract that he wouldn't eat crackers in bed!

If you're interested in Ossee for a similar condition Sovereign T205 or T206, let me know!  He's got a Factory 25/350 back.

Take Care,
Geno

[IMG]http://i144.photobucket.com/albums/r181/HercDriver_photo/T206SchreckFront.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i144.photobucket.com/albums/r181/HercDriver_photo/T206SchreckBack.jpg[/IMG]
